field.name: LdapBinddn
field.label: LDAP binddn
field.help: The user account on the LDAP server that is used to query the directory. Leave empty to connect anonymously.

field.name: LdapPassword
field.label: LDAP password
field.help: The password of the user account on the LDAP server that is used to query the directory.

field.name: LdapFilter
field.label: LDAP filter
field.help: Filter used to look up user accounts in the LDAP database. It is an arbitrary LDAP filter in string representation. Any `%s` placeholder will be replaced by the login (identifier) provided by the user, the filter should contain at least one such placeholder. The filter must result in exactly one (1) result, otherwise the login will be considered invalid.

field.name: LdapBase
field.label: LDAP base
field.help: DN of the user search scope: all descendants of this base will be searched for users.

field.name: User
field.label: Template User
field.help: User to copy when creating new users

field.name: CreateUser
field.help: Automatically create local user accounts for new users authenticating via LDAP

field.name: LdapTls
field.label: Use TLS
field.help: Request secure TLS/SSL encryption when connecting to the LDAP server. This option requires a server with STARTTLS enabled, otherwise all authentication attempts will fail.
